item.title: Google I/O 2025: AI & Vibe Coding Announcements for Software Builders
item.description: Google I/O 2025 was packed with exciting updates for anyone building software, especially in the AI and “vibe coding” spaces. Here’s a concise, developer-focused summary of the key announcements.
